text: A domestic title insurer shall only declare or distribute a dividend to shareholders without the prior written approval of the Commissioner as would be permitted under § 31-706, for insurers other than life insurers.
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2151 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-223, see notes following § 31-5031.01.

DC CODE § 31-5031.10

Current through December 11, 2012
